title: Close to shopping, Fully furnished apartments, Siegel Rewards Program
posting_body: ['MLK Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-No long term lease required', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Storage Units', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Easy freeway access', '-Close to shopping', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Basketball Court', '-Large loft apartments', '-Large two bedroom apartments', '-Unfurnished apartments', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
